title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 今天 晚上 不 喝酒。
eng: Tonight I'm not going to drink.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 爸爸  不 回来 吃 晚饭。
eng: Dad is not coming back to eat dinner.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 老板 明天 不 来 。
eng: The boss won't come tomorrow.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 知道 这 个 周末 不 下雨。
py: Wǒ zhīdào zhège zhōumò bù xiàyǔ.
eng: I know it's not going to rain this weekend.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 女朋友 不 跟 你 一起 去 吗？
py: Nǐ nǚpéngyou bù gēn nǐ yīqǐ qù ma?
eng: Is your girlfriend not going with you?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 不 吃 肉。
eng: I don't eat meat.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你们 都 不 喝酒 吗？
eng: Do you all not drink alcohol?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 他 不 喜欢 说话。
eng: He doesn't like to speak.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 不 用 手机 看书 吗？
py: Nǐ bù  yòng shǒujī kàn shū ma?
eng: Do you not use your phone to read books?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 晚上 不 洗澡 吗？
eng: Don't you shower at night?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我们 不 饿。
eng: We're not hungry.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 不 胖。
eng: You are not fat.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 家 不 远。
eng: My home is not far.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 今天 不 冷。
eng: Today it isn't cold.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 觉得 Starbucks 的 咖啡 不 好喝。
py: Wǒ juéde Starbucks de kāfēi bù hǎohē.
eng: I think the coffee at Starbucks isn't good.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 是 不是 我 的 老师？
py: Nǐ shì bu shì wǒ de lǎoshī?
eng: Are you my teacher or not?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 她 想 不  想 来？
eng: Does she want to come?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 爱 不 爱 我？
eng: Do you love me or not?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你们 周末 上 不 上班？
eng: Do you all go to work on weekends?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 的 外国 朋友们 喜 不 喜欢 吃 中国菜？
py: Nǐ de wàiguó péngyoumen xǐ bu xǐhuan chī Zhōngguó cài?
eng: Do your foreign friends like to eat Chinese food?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我们 去 吃饭 ，好 不 好？
py: Wǒmen qù chīfàn, hǎo bu hǎo?
eng: Let's go eat, is that OK?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你们 是 好 朋友 ，对 不 对？
py: Nǐmen shì hǎo péngyou, duì bu duì?
eng: You are good friends, right?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 他 没有 打 电话 给 我 。
py: Tā méiyǒu dǎ diànhuà gěi wǒ.
eng: He did not give me a call.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 没 去 上班 吗 ？
eng: You didn't go to work?

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 昨天 没 喝酒。
eng: I did not drink alcohol yesterday.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 妈妈 没有 做 晚饭。
eng: Mom did not cook dinner.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 他们 吃 完 饭 以后 没 付 钱。
py: Tāmen chī wán fàn yǐhòu méi fù qián.
eng: They didn't pay after they finished eating.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 没有 钱。
eng: I don't have money.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 他 没有 女朋友。
eng: He doesn't have a girlfriend.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 没 办法。
eng: I don't have a way.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 没有 办法。
eng: I don't have a way.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 你 没有 我 高。
eng: You are not as tall as me.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 的 手机 没有 他 的 手机 贵。
py: Wǒ de shǒujī méiyǒu tā de shǒujī guì.
eng: My cell phone isn't as expensive as his.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我们 都 没有  老板 忙。
eng: We all are not as busy as the boss.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 上海 的 冬天 没有  北京 的 冬天 冷。
py: Shànghǎi de dōngtiān méiyǒu Běijīng de dōngtiān lěng.
eng: Shanghai winters are not as cold Beijing winters.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 他 以前 不 是 我的 老板。
py: Tā yǐqián bù shì wǒ de lǎobǎn.
eng: He was not my boss before.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 我 不 知道 他 要 来。
py: Wǒ bù zhīdào tā yào lái.
eng: I didn't know he was coming.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 他 小时候 不 认识 她。
py: Tā xiǎo shíhou bù rènshi tā.
eng: He did not know her when he was young.

title: Comparing "bu" and "mei"
zh: 昨天 我 不 在 家 。
eng: I was not home yesterday.
